result.reason: The user requests a visual signal for activity in background SSH tabs; currently, only title text updates are supported.
result.approach: Modify PuttyBase to detect title changes or window invalidation in background sessions and trigger a visual indicator (e.g., color change or icon update) on the ConnectionTab.

attempts.raw_output:
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "The user requests a visual signal for activity in background SSH tabs; currently, only title text updates are supported.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/PuttyBase.cs", "mRemoteNG/UI/Tabs/ConnectionTab.cs"],
"approach": "Modify PuttyBase to detect title changes or window invalidation in background sessions and trigger a visual indicator (e.g., color change or icon update) on the ConnectionTab."
}
